name: Smartest Monkey FREE
description:
Great Nine Men's Morris board game for the entire family!
Enjoy quality time with your kids - play together, laugh together and help your children improve their brain skills.
The cute monkeys in this Mill game will become your kid's favorite heroes.
It's so much fun!
_____________________________________

Play "Smartest Monkey" wherever you go! Play it at home, play it in the park, play it with friends, even in your car. You and your kids will never аgain be bored during those long trips.
- It's fun - your kids will love the cute and colourful graphics!
- It's challenging - ideal game for brain teasing.
- The simple rules of "Smartest Monkey" make it perfect for children.
- But don't be fooled, the game is challenging for grown-ups too!
You will want to play it more and more.
_____________________________________

Features:
- Rich user experience;
- Single or multiplayer modes - Play alone or with friends via Internet or Bluetooth;
- Different level maps, amusing tunes;
- Who is the best? – check out the Score board;
- Different difficulty levels;
- Think faster - the clock is ticking.
